description: Tools for introspection, decision-making, and managing your most important asset: you.

templates.title: Decision Dashboard
templates.description: AI-guided template to weigh pros/cons, impact, and confidence level of a tough decision (e.g., pricing, pivot, platform choice).

templates.title: Vision Board Generator
templates.description: Fun, visual template with drag-and-drop elements to create a digital founder vision board — brand, life, vibe, goals.

templates.title: Quarterly Biz Review
templates.description: Guided reflection on wins, misses, growth, and lessons — includes space for metrics, testimonials, and emotional check-ins.

templates.title: Delegation List Builder
templates.description: Template that helps founders identify and list what they should delegate (or automate), with AI suggestions by task type.

templates.title: 'I Hate This' Tracker
templates.description: Quirky burnout prevention tool. Log and tag things that drain you. Get pattern insights + suggestions to outsource, eliminate, or rethink.

description: Templates to attract your ideal customers and streamline your sales process.

templates.title: Freebie Funnel Builder
templates.description: A template for creating a lead magnet → email series → product teaser funnel. Echo + Blaze-lite vibe.

templates.title: DM Sales Script Generator
templates.description: For founders using IG/TikTok DMs for selling — input persona + offer, get tailored, non-cringe DM scripts.

templates.title: Offer Comparison Matrix
templates.description: For service-based founders with multiple packages. Visual grid template to compare features, benefits, pricing.

templates.title: Live Launch Tracker
templates.description: Time-blocked, daily action template to run a 5–7 day launch across email, social, and product updates.

templates.title: Upsell Flow Builder
templates.description: Simple path mapping tool to design a customer journey from first offer → upsell → loyalty program.

description: Frameworks to help you think strategically, plan effectively, and innovate on your ideas.

templates.title: Pre-Mortem Template
templates.description: Instead of a post-mortem, this AI-powered doc helps founders predict what could go wrong with a project — and fix it in advance.

templates.title: Reverse Engineer Your Role Models
templates.description: A template that helps break down their success into replicable elements.

templates.title: "Big Leap" Planner
templates.description: For bold pivots or risks — plan out one big scary move, with Blaze/Echo voice coaching along the way.

templates.title: Offer Naming Generator
templates.description: Drop your product details, vibe, and target — AI returns 3–5 names with reasons, vibes, and tone tags.

templates.title: Founder Feelings Tracker
templates.description: Part journal, part dashboard. Lets users log energy levels, focus blocks, and motivation triggers for pattern insight.

description: Plan, create, and collaborate on content that grows your brand and network.

templates.title: Brag Bank Template
templates.description: Save wins, praise, testimonials, and accomplishments. Ready-to-paste into your pitch, portfolio, or case studies.

templates.title: AI Collab Planner (For Guest Content)
templates.description: Use this to plan guest posts, podcast appearances, and collabs — includes smart prompts for positioning and topics.

templates.title: PR Pitch Template
templates.description: Send story ideas to media, blogs, or podcast hosts. Includes headline hooks, founder bio boilerplate, and intro email drafts.

templates.title: Viral Hook Generator
templates.description: Input content idea + vibe. Get high-engagement hook options (e.g., "what nobody tells you about…") in text or video format.

templates.title: Values-Aligned Biz Filter
templates.description: A template to evaluate biz opportunities, partnerships, or decisions against your core values and long-term vision.
